meanings.definition: Not able to be located or identified.
meanings.sent1: The missing key was unplaceable in the messy room.
meanings.sent2: The ghostly figure was unplaceable in the dark hallway.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky cat seemed unplaceable, always hiding in unexpected spots.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like unplaceable shadows, fleeting and elusive.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious treasure remained unplaceable, hidden from all who sought it.

meanings.definition: Not able to be assigned a specific place or category.
meanings.sent1: The abstract artwork was unplaceable in any traditional gallery.
meanings.sent2: Her unique style was unplaceable among the other fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: The strange creature was unplaceable, neither fish nor fowl.
meanings.sent4: His music was like an unplaceable melody, haunting yet beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The new invention was unplaceable, defying all known classifications.
